channel.title: Adding sounds on a 317 tut!
channel.description: Hello, i just looked at a tut on adding sounds. it teached me how to make sounds for a item like whip when it does spec it does the sound. i need help like making sounds for a whip everytime i hit a npc or a player not everytime i do spec. and i need a sound for like when i go to lumby it plays the lumby song. the one on Runescape.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 07, 2009, 02:20:18 pm[/size][hr]help plox

item.title: Adding sounds on a 317 tut!
item.dc:creator: @123kdd100 123kdd100
item.description:
@123kdd100 wrote:

Hello, i just looked at a tut on adding sounds.
it teached me how to make sounds for a item like whip when it does spec it does the sound.
i need help like making sounds for a whip everytime i hit a npc or a player not everytime i do spec.
and i need a sound for like when i go to lumby it plays the lumby song.
the one on Runescape.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 07, 2009, 02:20:18 pm[/size][hr]help plox
